/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the city's blend of tradition and modernity. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
